msDesc.head: George Pachymeres, Philosophia; 16th century, second half

msItem.note: Prooimion on Philosophia and Table of Contents, tit. Γεωργίου τοῦ παχυμέρους Προοίμιον τοῦ συγγραφέως, καὶ πίναξ τοῦ παρόντος βιβλίου.
Philosophia. Titles, incipits and desinits are given only in the unpublished books.
Book 2, Physica, tit. Βιβλίον βον ἡ φυσικὴ ἀκρόασις. Τίτλος αος´. Κεφάλαιον αον´, inc. Σκοπὸς τοῦ βιβλίου τούτου ζητῆσαι περὶ τῆς ἀρχῆς τῶν ὄντων … des. γενήσεται δέ, καὶ τοῦτο εἶναι κατὰ συμβεβηκός.
Book 3, De caelo, ed. I. Telelis, Georgios Pachymeres Philosophia. Book 3 In Aristotelis De Caelo Commentary, Athens, 2016, pp. 1–84.

Book 4, De generatione et corruptione, tit. βιβλίον δ´Τὸ περὶ γενέσεως καὶ φθορᾶς. περὶ τῶν φύσει γινομένων καὶ φθειρομένων. Τίτλος αος´. Κεφάλαιον αον, inc. Πολλὺς παρὰ τοῖς φιλοσόφοις … des. καὶ ἄλλως τὸ ὀστοῦν καὶ ἄλλως ἡ σὰρξ ἢ ὁ μυελὸς ξηρά.
Book 5, Meteorologica, ed. I. Telelis, Georgios Pachymeres Philosophia. Book 5 Commentary in Aristotle’s Meteorologica, Athens, 2012, pp. 1–76.
Book 6, De partibus animalium, ed. E. Pappa, Georgios Pachymeres Philosophia. Buch 6: Kommentar zu de Partibus Animalium des Aristoteles, Athens, 2008, pp. 1–48.

Book 7, De anima, tit. Βυβλίον ἕβδομον, τὸ περὶ ψυχῆς. Τίτλος αος´. Κεφάλαιον αον. Δόξαι τῶν παλαιῶν περὶ ψυχῆς. inc. Τούτων δὲ διωρισμένων, σκεπτέον ἂν εἴη καὶ περὶ ψυχῆς … des. κατὰ τὴν θαυμαστικὴν καὶ ἄρρητον οἰκονομίαν τῆς φύσεως.

Book 10, Metaphysica; fols 152a and 152b with notes and diagrams mainly by J. Morezenos, esp. fol. 152a, ed. E. Pappa, Georgios Pachymeres, Philosophia, Buch 10: Kommentar zur Metaphysik des Aristoteles, Athens, 2002, pp. 1–84.
Book 11, Ethica Nicomachea, ed. K. Oikonomakos, Γεώργιος Παχυμέρης Φιλοσοφία, Βιβλίον Ἑνδέκατον. Τὰ Ἠθικά, ἤτοι τὰ Νικομάχεια, Athens, 2005, pp. 1–100.

Book 12, De coloribus, De lineis insecabilibus, Mechanica (as one book in the MS). Tit. Τίτλος αος´ κεφάλαιον αον. Περὶ τῶν ἁπλῶν χρωμάτων. inc. Ἁπλᾶ τῶν χρωμάτων ἐστὶν, ὅσα τοῖς στοιχείοις … des. ἅπαντα ἀνάγκη δὲ τοῦτο δὴ ἀθροίζεσθαι.

supportDesc.extent: iii + 212 leaves (fols 152a and 152b are pasted in) + ii (foliated as 212–213) 200 145

handDesc.handNote: Μάξιμος Μαργούνιος, See RGK I, 259; RGK II, 356; RGK III, 427, fols 1r-151v, 153–211.

decoDesc.decoNote: Small decorative headpiece in the beginning fol. 1r.

additions.p: fol. iii(r): various notes on philosophy: δυνάμει καθ᾽ ἐπιστήμην, ἐνεργίᾳ κατὰ τὸ θεωρεῖν (?)/ mesum angeli dissemum efficie D. T.
fol. 5: (sup lin in red ink): ἱστέον ὅτι τῆς λογικῆς ἑκόντες εἶναι παρίεμεν διὰ τὸ ἐν τύποις ταῦτα κεκτῆσθαι.
fol. 211v: ἕως ὧδε ἐν τῷ πρωτοτύπῳ

binding.p: Typical Holkham binding of brown leather, with Coke family ostrich crest in gilt in the centre of the upper cover; Date: early nineteenth century. Rebound by John Jones of Liverpool (worked for Holkham 1816–1823. The spine lettered in gilt: / GEORGII PACHYMERI PHILOSOPHICA GR. M.S. SÆC. XV./ in pasted black leather: MS. /HOLKHAM/ Gr. 73/

history.provenance: Margounios mentions (fol. 5r, see below in marginalia) that he skipped the 1st book since it had already been published. This locates the date of the copying of the MS sometime possibly between 1548 and 1602. 1548 is the year of the edition of Γεωργίου διακόνου, πρωτεκδίκου καὶ δικαιοφύλακος τοῦ Παχυμέρους, Ἑπιτομὴ τῆς Ἀριστοτέλους Λογικῆς, Paris 1548, so it is a terminus post quem and 1602 is a terminus ante quem, as death year of the copyist of the MS, Maximos Margounios. 1602 is also the year of another publication: Γεωργίου τοῦ Παχυμέρους, Σύνοψις εἰς ἅπασαν τὴν λογικὴν πραγματείαν, Augustae Vindel, 1602. See also E. Pappa, ‘Die Kommentare des Georgios Pachymeres zum Organon’ in I. Vassis, G. S. Henrich and D. R. Reinsch, eds, Lesarten Festschrift für Athanasios Kambylis zum 70. Geburtstag Dargebracht von Schülern, Kollegen und Freunden, Berlin, 1998, 202 and E. Pappa (ed.), Georgios Pachymeres. Philosophia. Buch 10. Kommentar zur Metaphysik des Aristoteles. Editio princeps, Corpus philosophorum medii aevi. Commentaria in Aristotelem Byzantina 2, Athens 2002, p. 84*

: Ownership Notes: 1st paste down on the verso (in the centre, in pencil): MS. Holkham Gr. 73; fol. ir: (in pencil); Holk Cat. No. 120 106 (subscr. 109 110) D2 A.9 ; Old Catalogue Nrs: Olim Holkham Hall, Libr. of the Earl of Leicester, 110 fol. iii(r) (at the top): ἐκ τῶν Ἰωάννου τοῦ μορεζήνου (sec manu: τάχα καὶ θύτου) (tert. manu: 1635); (top right in grey ink) ΜΔ ον: = Morezenos 44; (top, right) handwritten note in brown ink by B. de Montfaucon: 1698· Codex/ num 39· Geor./gii Pachymeri/ Philosophica/ annorum/ circiter 200. (= Giustiniani 39).

recordHist.source: Description by Dimitrios Skrekas (2019), with the support of the Leventis Foundation, the Oxford Centre for Byzantine Research, the Yerolemou Trust and the Michael Marks Charitable Trust.

ref.title: Pinakes | Πίνακες: Textes et manuscrits grecs
